## About the project

The objective of this project is to enhance skills in FIGMA Design to React using typescript for the front-end portion of a website. The focus is on creating a responsive website using desktop design only.

[![live demo link](https://img.shields.io/badge/Live%20Demo-00B9ae?style=for-the-badge)](https://idembele70.github.io/designely/)

[![figma design of the app](./public/assets/app.png)](<https://www.figma.com/file/TM1E0t1dYQHhPHjYTvTzM4/Ui-Designe-(Community)?node-id=0%3A1&t=qIW80b1A22yx8M25-1>)

## Authors

- [Sir,nnh](https://www.figma.com/@4dfbdb9b_d651_4) created the figma template [Template](https://www.figma.com/community/file/1144235604225299992).
- To develop the application, I used React with Typescript and several NPM libraries.
